Salt_Lake_City.Armista Apartments:
The Armista Apartments, known also as the Waldorf Apartments, at 555 Eest 100 South in Salt Lake City, Utah, United States were built in 1927. They were listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1989.
The building is significant as representing the urbanization of Salt Lake City during 1890–1930, a period in which more than 180 "urban apartments" (apartment buildings) were built.
